result.title: Recruitment of 5 local centres
result.description: We will then identify five local geographic hosts centres though a call for innovation centre partners with a focus n Portugal, Italy, Norway, Croatia and Estonia. These countries are under-represented in the European social innovation ecosystem and hence offer strong ground for experimentation. We will work closely with WP Engagement and Dissemination to share the opportunity with a diverse range of potential centres.

result.title: Stakeholder Conference
result.description: Stakeholder conference: A specific action would be organizing a conference, preferably in Brussels, in which relevant stakeholders will be invited to analyse and debate around the findings and proposal arising from the project. Invited stakeholders will comprise members of the industry, the European Commission and the academic sector. The basis for the debate will be the policy paper prepared (D3.3) in WP. The different opinions and feedback during the conference will be captured in a report (D4.2) and will help to update the policy paper to a new version that takes into account this and any other relevant feedback received (D4.3)

result.title: Protocol desk research barriers and incentives
result.description: A clear protocol will be developed for desk research mapping of barriers. The protocol will reflect the diverse nature of the three domains and will contend with the possibility that the three identified situations (explicit application of RRI, implicit application of RRI, no RRI in evidence) may manifest in different socio-technical contexts (e.g. different countries). The protocol will ensure a standardised yet flexible approach to data collection

result.title: List of the selected companies
result.description: Initial list followed by regular updates. The partners will be focused on companies that would not have access, under normal circumstances, to innovation management consultancy services. In order to ensure that the limited funding resources available are used most effectively, the selection of SMEs will be based on a pool of innovative companies
